name: Golf (itch) (GOMF)
description:
Simple golf game inspired by the 2D golf games of the late 80s/early 90s, like NES Open Tournament Golf.

It includes 1 course with 18 holes.

Controls

Keyboard:

  • 2, 3 - change club
  • W, E - change backwards spin
  • F1 - view green
  • F2 - view minimap
  • F5 - reset hole
  • TAB - show score
  • ARROWS - move camera

Mouse:

  • LEFT BUTTON  - hit ball (3-click swing)
  • RIGHT BUTTON - center camera
Development

Although the game is listed as a prototype, there are still a few things that I want to add:

  • 3-click swing system
  • Simple 3D view
  • Higher trees
  • More courses

The archive comes bundled with a Java 11 Runtime Environment.
